Key: #Tools - those default tools to exclude and non-default tools to include

Notes: e.g. 'vis1, vis3' to remove the 'Two-column key' and 'Side-by-side comparison' visualisations
e.g. 'visEarthworm' to add a custom visualisation (must be installed to work)
e.g. 'vis2' to start the framework with the 'Single-column key' visualisation selected
If value set to 'yes' (lower case) validity checks and reporting will be carried out by the visualisation software.
